Custom message handling class for the Fleet Management System.

Displays a message and logs it in the terminal.

Parameters:

  • message (str) – The message content to display and log.

Display the tooltip near the widget when the mouse enters.

Tooltip widget displays a ttk.Label in a Toplevel without window decoration.

Return the resource value for a KEY given as string.

Configure resources of a widget.

The values for resources are specified as keyword arguments. To get an overview about the allowed keyword arguments call the method keys.
